title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example is experiencing excessive flashing. This bug report aims to identify the cause of the issue.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window only in the vertical direction, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames are observed to flash.
EB: The expected behavior is that only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, without any flashing occurring in the TabFolder or Frames.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Run the Control Example.
2. Resize the window only in the vertical direction.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames are flashing.
